instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Without image
threads.message: I have this card that turns on emits the boot sound the lcd panel turns on but no image, illuminated black screen, where you can see some rejections, I tried to change lcd but the result is the same.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Without image
threads.message:
Do you get external video?

Check <CAPACITOR>C8320</CAPACITOR>/21/24/25 and their traces.
Also check <RESISTOR>R8370</RESISTOR>/80.
Bad contacts on J8300 is another option.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Without image
threads.message: I get the external video, I checked the values and tracks, after connecting an external monitor to the thunderbolt port the screen is illuminated but black without images even now even after disconnecting it
